name: Basic Membership
description: Our Basic Membership offers essential gym access, including cardio equipment, locker room facilities, and a complimentary fitness assessment. It's the perfect starting point for your fitness journey.

name: Silver Membership
description: Upgrade to our Silver Membership for unlimited group fitness classes in addition to basic amenities. Enjoy cardio workouts and group classes with two complimentary fitness assessments.

name: Gold Membership
description: Our Gold Membership offers a premium experience, including personalized workout plans and unlimited group fitness classes. You'll also receive four complimentary fitness assessments to track your progress.

name: Student Membership
description: Designed for students, our Student Membership provides gym access with a valid student ID. Enjoy cardio equipment and locker room amenities while staying within your budget.

name: Family Membership
description: Our Family Membership is perfect for families seeking a healthy lifestyle. Access gym facilities, unlimited group fitness classes, childcare services, and four complimentary fitness assessments.

name: Corporate Membership
description: For corporate wellness, our Corporate Membership offers discounted rates for employees. Enjoy gym access, cardio equipment, locker rooms, and two complimentary fitness assessments.

name: Senior Membership
description: Senior citizens aged 65+ can stay active with our Senior Membership, which provides gym access, cardio equipment, and locker room amenities at an affordable price.

name: Premium Membership
description: Upgrade to our Premium Membership for personal trainer sessions, unlimited group fitness classes, and six complimentary fitness assessments. Elevate your fitness journey with us.

name: Weekend Warrior
description: Our Weekend Warrior plan is designed for those with busy weekdays. Get access on weekends, cardio equipment, locker rooms, and two complimentary fitness assessments.

name: Premium Plus Membership
description: Experience the ultimate fitness journey with our Premium Plus Membership. Enjoy spa and sauna access, personalized workouts, unlimited group classes, and eight complimentary fitness assessments.

name: One-Year Membership
description: Commit to a year of fitness with our One-Year Membership. Enjoy full gym access, cardio equipment, locker rooms, and receive a total of 12 complimentary fitness assessments throughout the year.

name: Couple's Membership
description: Share your fitness journey with a loved one through our Couple's Membership. Get access to gym facilities, cardio equipment, locker rooms, and enjoy unlimited group fitness classes together.

name: VIP Membership
description: Experience the utmost luxury with our VIP Membership. Enjoy exclusive VIP events, personal trainer sessions, spa, sauna access, unlimited group classes, and eight complimentary fitness assessments.

name: Day Pass
features: Access to gym facilities for a day
description: Need a one-day fitness boost? Grab our Day Pass for access to gym facilities, cardio equipment, and locker room amenities for a full day of workouts.

name: Punch Card
features: Access to gym facilities for 10 visits
description: For occasional visits, our Punch Card offers access to gym facilities for 10 visits. Use cardio equipment and enjoy locker room access as you need it.

name: Group Membership
description: Join as a group and stay fit together with our Group Membership. Get access to gym facilities, cardio equipment, locker rooms, and unlimited group fitness classes.

name: Student Summer Membership
features: 3 months of access during the summer
description: Students can make the most of their summer break with our Student Summer Membership. Enjoy gym access, cardio equipment, and locker rooms for three months.

name: Family Plus Membership
description: Elevate family fitness with our Family Plus Membership. Access gym facilities, group classes, childcare services, spa, sauna, and receive six complimentary fitness assessments.

name: Weekday Warrior
description: Stay active during the weekdays with our Weekday Warrior plan. Enjoy gym access, cardio equipment, locker rooms, and three complimentary fitness assessments.

name: Senior Plus Membership
description: Senior citizens aged 65+ can stay fit and socialize with our Senior Plus Membership. Access gym facilities, group classes, cardio equipment, and locker room amenities at an affordable rate.
